english.aboutSubtitle: A tool to promote oral production in language learning
english.aboutDescription1: Placoteurs is born to help people learning a language to promote oral production, proposing concepts so they can generate a story.
english.aboutDescription2: This project arises from the need to integrate into society in Qu√©bec, where I participated in the francization courses offered by the province of Qu√©bec. As a way of giving back, I want to contribute with a small tool to all students, especially those learning French in Qu√©bec.

english.step2: Use these concepts to create an oral or written story
english.step3: Practice your expression in the language you're learning
